page.title: 20AKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: For there help in completing this project. MR.CHAPLIN- Hinkley and Bosworth council. MR.COOK- Geological survey-Birmingham. MRS.BRIGG,MR.MURRAY,MRS.WILKES,THE BAGNALL FAMILY-of Orton-on-the-Hill. THE STAFF-Atherstone library. MR. WILLIS-Ivy House Farm-Warton. MRS.BAUM-PICK Resident of Warton. MR.CORBETT-Austrey House THE RESIDENTS-Orton-on-the-Hill and Warton. The Children of POLESWORTH NETHERSOLES C.E. MIDDLE SCHOOL. DR.A.BARNES-MR.P.FRANCE-MR.M.LEDGER. MR.D.McCAULEY-MISS Y.E.CLARIDGE. REV.KENNETH BOSTOCK-Vicar of Orton.
